snippet: The Obama administration said Thursday that a United States government aid worker had been killed in an attack by suicide bombers in eastern Kunar Province.
abstract: Obama administration releases statement saying Ragaei Abdelfattah, Foreign Service officer working with the United States Agency for International Development, has been killed in attack by suicide bombers in Afghanistan; Taliban claims responsibility for attack.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration said Thursday that a United States government aid worker had been killed in an attack by suicide bombers in eastern Kunar Province.
